comments: Hayward (CHA) initiates contact to Stevens' (CLE) arm that affects his play at the basket.
Stevens (CLE) moves alongside Oubre Jr.'s (CHA) path and cleanly blocks his shot attempt. Any ensuing contact is incidental.
Garland (CLE) cleanly blocks Hayward's (CHA) shot attempt.
Allen (CLE) and Plumlee (CHA) mutually engage and disengage as both players are going for the loose ball.
Allen (CLE) maintains a legal vertical position while contesting Washington's (CHA) shot attempt.
Rozier (CHA) steps laterally into Mitchell's (CLE) path affecting his SQBR as Mitchell is dribbling the ball up the floor.
Plumlee (CHA) firms up in Garland's (CLE) path and marginal contact occurs as he is moving around the pick.
Hayward (CHA) cleanly deflects the ball away from Mitchell (CLE).
Rozier (CHA) reaches in and although he makes contact with the ball, he also makes contact to Allen's (CLE) right arm that affects his control of the ball.
Rozier (CHA) does not move his hand under the ball as he makes a move on the perimeter.
Plumlee (CHA) is set in Mobley's (CLE) path and as he is rolling toward the rim, Mobley's hand slides off Plumlee's upper body.
Mobley (CLE) does not release the throw-in within five seconds.
Both Hayward (CHA) and Washington (CHA) have their hands on the ball and Allen (CLE) loses control of it as he tries to  turn.
Garland (CLE) legally contests Washington's (CHA) jump shot attempt.
Mitchell (CLE) loses his balance after reaching for the rebound. The contact between Richards (CHA) and Love (CLE) is marginal.
Garland (CLE) dives for the loose ball and Rozier (CHA) incidentally trips over him. Washington (CHA) then places his hands on the ball and a held ball is correctly called.
Washington (CHA) firms up in a screening position in Okoro's (CLE) path and does not deliver contact when it occurs to his front.
Okoro (CLE) legally contests Rozier's (CHA) jump shot attempt.
Mobley (CLE) moves alongside Washington's (CHA) path and maintains a legal guarding position during the shot attempt.
Richards (CHA) and Allen (CLE) mutually engage and disengage during the rebound attempt.
Richards (CHA) firms up in Garland's (CLE) path and the contact that occurs is marginal.
Rozier (CHA) initiates some contact with Allen's (CLE) arm when he reaches in and he maintains his balance after controlling the rebound.
Washington (CHA) is set in Garland's (CLE) path and incidental contact occurs as Garland is going over the top of the pick.
Garland (CLE) and Washington (CHA) mutually engage and disengage in the post.
Love (CLE) is set in Oubre Jr.'s (CHA) path and marginal contact occurs as Oubre Jr. is moving over the top of the screen.
Mobley (CLE) legally contests Rozier's (CHA) jump shot attempt.
Richards (CHA) and Allen (CLE) come together and marginal contact occurs as both players go for the loose ball.
